item.title: [SYD/SGP][VirtalPrivateServers] - Traffic bandwidth limitation
item.description:
May 17, 14:39 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 01/05/2023 00:00 UTC
End Time : 17/05/2023 14:29 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to a bug in a metric component of our infrastructure.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

May 17, 13:45 UTC
Update - Start time : Our teams are in the process of putting a fix in production to solve the problem. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

May 17, 09:37 UTC
Identified - Start time : 01/05/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : Some VPS traffic have been limited.
Ongoing actions : Email percentage calculation is in progress. Correct limitation will be apply on each VPS
For VPS solutions hosted in Sydney and Singapore: There is traffic limitation : 1TB traffic/month for the Starter and Value ranges, 2TB/month for the Essential range, 3TB/month for the Comfort range, and 4TB/month for the Elite range. Bandwidth is reduced to 10Mbit/s once the monthly quota has been exceeded.
An email alert is sent regarding the bandwidth reduction.
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [Global][Additionnal services] - End of Life - RTM package
item.description:
May 17, 13:15 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

May 17, 13:11 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 11/05/2023 12:00 UTC
Service impact : The RTM package has been decommissioned from last-public-ovh-rtm.snap.mirrors.ovh.net.
It won't be possible to install or update it anymore.

item.title: [RBX7][Dedicated Servers] - Rack R715B14
item.description:
May 17, 05:42 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

May 17, 04:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 27, 22:03 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 17/05/2023 04:00 UTC
End time : 17/05/2023 04:30 UTC
Service impact : Servers in rack R715B14 will be temporarily unreachable during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will be doing electrical works on rack R715B14
